sms_options_manage_information_text: With OVHcloud, you can set callback URLs to receive an alert when an event occurs on an SMS.
sms_options_manage_information_types_ava: There are two types of callback:
sms_options_manage_information_type_call: The status change callback: When an SMS that has been sent changes status (e.g. from "sent" to "delivered").
sms_options_manage_information_type_stop: STOP callback: When a recipient replies with "STOP" to one of your SMS messages, to blacklist you.
sms_options_manage_update_callbacks_erro: The link must start with http:// or https://.
The URL entered is not valid.
